page.title: Solarflesh – A Gospel of Radiant Divinity

revision.text:
{{Infobox album | name = Solarflesh – A Gospel of Radiant Divinity | type = studio | artist = [[Hate (band)|Hate]] | cover = Solarflesh.jpg | alt = | released = February 4, 2013 | recorded = June–July, 2012 | venue = | studio = | genre = [[Blackened death metal]] | length = 47:39 (Original release)
61:10 (Limited Edition) | label = [[Napalm Records]] | producer = Adam "ATF Sinner" Buszko | prev_title = [[Erebos (Hate album)|Erebos]] | prev_year = 2010 | next_title = [[Crusade:Zero]] | next_year = 2015 }} '''''Solarflesh – A Gospel of Radiant Divinity''''' is the eighth studio album by the [[Poland|Polish]] [[death metal]] band [[Hate (band)|Hate]]. The follow-up to 2010's "Erebos" was recorded at Sound Division Studio in Warsaw with [[Filip Hałucha|Filip "Heinrich" Hałucha]] ([[Vesania]], [[Decapitated (band)|Decapitated]]) and Arek "Malta" Malczewski ([[Behemoth (band)|Behemoth]]'s sound engineer).{{cite web|title= Solarflesh - Hate : Songs, Reviews, Credits, Awards : Metal Underground|url=http://www.blabbermouth.net/news.aspx?mode=Article&newsitemID=182499|publisher=www.blabbermouth.net| accessdate = August 9, 2013}} The CD was mixed at Hertz Studio in [[Bialystok, Poland]] with producers Wiesławscy Brothers. == Track list == {{Tracklist | title1 = Watchful Eye ov Doom | note1 = instrumental | music1 = Adam Buszko | length1 = 3:20 | title2 = Eternal Might | lyrics2 = Adam Buszko | music2 = Adam Buszko | length2 = 6:08 | title3 = Alchemy ov Blood | lyrics3 = Adam Buszko | music3 = Adam Buszko, Stanisław Malanowicz | length3 = 4:58 | title4 = Timeless Kingdom | lyrics4 = Adam Buszko | music4 = Adam Buszko, Stanisław Malanowicz | length4 = 5:31 | title5 = Festival ov Slaves | lyrics5 = Adam Buszko | music5 = Adam Buszko | length5 = 4:34 | title6 = Sadness will Last Forever | lyrics6 = Adam Buszko | music6 = Adam Buszko, Stanisław Malanowicz | length6 = 7:05 | title7 = Solarflesh | lyrics7 = Adam Buszko | music7 = Adam Buszko | length7 = 5:35 | title8 = Endless Purity | lyrics8 = Konrad Ramotowski | music8 = Konrad Ramotowski, Stanisław Malanowicz | length8 = 5:43 | title9 = Mesmerized | lyrics9 = Adam Buszko | music9 = Adam Buszko | length9 = 4:56 }} {{Track listing |collapsed= yes | headline = Bonus Tracks | title10 = Hatehammer | lyrics10 = Adam Buszko | music10 = Adam Buszko | length10 = 4:07 | title11 = Venom | lyrics11 = Adam Buszko | music11 = Adam Buszko | length11 = 4:15 | title12 = Fall ov All Icons | lyrics12 = Adam Buszko | music12 = Adam Buszko | length12 = 5:09 }} ==Reception== {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Revolver Magazine]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|4|5}}{{cite web | url = http://www.revolvermag.com/reviews/review-hate-solarflesh.html | title = Hate - "Solarflesh: A Gospel of Radiant Divinity" review |publisher=www.revolvermag.com| last = Pratt | first = Greg | date = January 22, 2013 | accessdate = August 9, 2013}} | rev2 = [[Metal Force]] | rev2Score = {{Rating|8.5|10}}http://www.metalforcesmagazine.com/site/album-review-hate-solarflesh/ | rev3 = [[Metal Hammer]] | rev3Score = 7/10{{cite web | url = http://metalhammer.teamrock.com/reviews/2013-02-05/hate-solarflesh | title = Metal Hammer Hate Solarflesh review | last = Dare | first = Tom | date = February 5, 2013 | accessdate = April 6, 2015}} | rev4 = [[Exclaim!]] | rev4Score = favorablehttp://exclaim.ca/Reviews/Metal/hate-solarflesh }} The album received mixed to positive reviews. Writing for [[Revolver Magazine]], Greg Pratt said that on Solarflesh, Hate "nailed the best of modern no-frills death metal" and that "With a production that’s pristine but not overdone, this album is the moment Hate have been working towards all these years", giving the album a 4/5. Madam X's review on Angry Metal Guy was more critical of the album, giving it 2.5/5 and concluding that "I’m hoping Solarflesh ends up being a grower. ATF Sinner’s vocal style is just as big, hostile and euphorically brutal now as back in 2010, and once cranked up full-ball, I already enjoy Solarflesh more than I did the first few times I spun it. Right now though, I don’t find the album that different to what Hate (and their Polish counterparts) have put out before and added to that the watered down sound there’s nothing driving me to pick Solarflesh over Hate’s Erebos masterpiece."{{cite web | url = http://www.angrymetalguy.com/hate-solarflesh-review/ | title = AMG Solarflesh review | date = February 8, 2013 | accessdate = April 6, 2015}} Metal Hammer gave the album a positive review, awarding it 7/10 and writing that "They sound particularly sinister this time out, and the flavour suits them." ==Personnel== Personnel adapted from Allmusic.http://www.allmusic.com/album/solarflesh-a-gospel-of-radiant-divinity-mw0002467141/credits {| |valign="top"| ; Hate * Adam "ATF Sinner" Buszko - [[guitars]], [[vocals]], soundscapes, samples, production * Konrad "Destroyer" Ramotowski - [[guitars]] * Stanislaw "Hexen" Malanowicz - [[drums]] * Sławomir "Mortifer" Arkhangelsky - [[bass guitar]] ; Additional musicians * Mateusz Szemraj - [[oud]] on 'Solarflesh', [[lead guitar]] on 'Sadness Will Last Forever * Androniki Skoula - [[backing vocals]] on 'Watchful Eye ov Doom' and 'Mesmerized' |width="10"| |valign="top"| ; Production * Daniel Rusiłowicz - artwork, cover art, layout, photography * Sławek & Wojtek Wiesławscy - mixing, mastering * [[Filip Hałucha|Filip "Heinrich" Hałucha]] - engineering, bass guitar on 'Endless Purity' * Arkadiusz "Malta" Malczewski - engineering assistant * Michał Staczkun - engineering, soundscapes, samples * Christos Antonio - engineering ; Note *Recorded at Sound Division Studio, June/July 2012, Warsaw, Poland. *Mixed & mastered at Hertz, August 2012, Bialystok, Poland. *Background female vocals in tracks 1 and 9 engineered at Devasoundz Studio, Athens. |} == References == {{reflist}} {{Hate (band)}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Solarflesh - A Gospel of Radiant Divinity}} [[Category:2013 albums]] [[Category:Napalm Records albums]]
